text: Wa Rasulaan 'Ila Bani 'Isra'ila 'Anni Qad Ji'tukum Bi'ayatin Min Rabbikum 'Anni 'Akhluqu Lakum Mina At-Tini Kahay'ati At-Tayri Fa'anfukhu Fihi Fayakunu Tayraan Bi'idhni Allahi Wa 'Ubri'u Al-'Akmaha Wa Al-'Abrasa Wa 'Uhyi Al-Mawta Bi'idhni Allahi Wa 'Unabbi'ukum Bima Ta'kuluna Wa Ma Taddakhiruna Fi Buyutikum 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Lakum 'In Kuntum Mu'uminyna
